description:
This course shows you how you can optimise your own WordPress for search engines by tweaking the On-Page elements of your blog. The course contains screencasts showing you step by step how optimize an entire site.

The course is designed to allow you to follow any video at any time at your own pace. There's nothing that should be done in order so you can easily watch any video and then implement the changing on your own WordPress blog.

On-Page SEO is what you can control on your own site. You can optimize your own blog so when search engines find your site you can maximise how the site is indexed.

We don NOT cover Off-Page SEO, that's the stuff where you build external links pointing to your site.
title: WordPress SEO
